Welcome to Static-gen!

To get started, you can edit the contents of this file in the /src directory.

To add sub-pages without having .html trailing in the url, create a directory for each new page and add a index.html file to each directory.

Static-gen supports for partials. You can place Partials in the /src/modules directory, and add them like so: include modules/_head.jade. Be sure to prepend each file name with _ to ensure they are recognized as partials.

For custom page styles, we prefer to add them to the pages directory located in /src/assets/_scss/pages.

Be sure to import each new SASS file in the /src/assets/css/main.scss file.

For more information on the Draft U.S. Web Design Standards, visit their website.

Happy coding!
